AtomCreator module¶

AtomCreator

Creates and rotates solvate molecules according to directional vectors and user input

AtomCreator.add_hydroxyl(coords, vectors, theta)[source]¶

Adds hydroxyl

Parameters:

coords : array

coordinates where oxygen should be placed

vectors : array

Directional vectors
Returns:

atoms

Oxygen and hydrogen coordinates

elements

List of element symbols

Adds 1-fold coordinated oxygen

Parameters:

coords : array

coordinates where oxygen should be placed

vectors : array

Directional vectors
Returns:

atoms

Oxygen coordinates

elements

List of element symbols

Adds water molecules

Coordinates where oxygen should be placed

vectors : array

Returns:

AtomCreator.align(vec1, vec2)[source]¶

Aligns one vector to another

Parameters:

vec1 : array

vec2 is aligned with vec1

vec2 : array

see vec1
Returns:

rotMatrix

Rotational matrix which performs the rotation

AtomCreator.xRotate(vector, angle)[source]¶

Rotates vector around x-axis

angle
